source.2b666185: GDP['ag']=GDP['Agriculture & allied activities']*100/GDP['Gross Domestic Product at factor cost']
source.38185b0e:
GDP['min']=GDP['Mining & Quarrying']*100/GDP['Gross Domestic Product at factor cost']
GDP['man']=GDP['Manufacturing']*100/GDP['Gross Domestic Product at factor cost']
GDP['electricity']=GDP['Electricity, Gas & Water Supply']*100/GDP['Gross Domestic Product at factor cost']
GDP['cons']=GDP['Trade, hotels, transport & communication']*100/GDP['Gross Domestic Product at factor cost']
GDP['fin']=GDP['Finance, Insurance, Real Estate & Business Services']*100/GDP['Gross Domestic Product at factor cost']
GDP['com']=GDP['Community, Social & Personal Services']*100/GDP['Gross Domestic Product at factor cost']
